reviews.review: CS:GO is a amazing FPS game! The best part about it, is that it's free! You should defo get it.

This game sucks

Shitty game to be honest. If you want to waste your time
apart from looking at ceiling in your room then here you go.

There is a good reason this game has been able to run the same maps for a long long time, its well balanced and heaps of fun, even for us old blokes whose reflexes have not remained quite as optimal as they once were.
Love it
